    An Application base class.

Package quarks.samples.apps Description

Support for some more complex Quarks application samples.

This package provides some commonly needed capabilities particularly in the area of an external configuration description influence on various things.

Focal areas:

  • AbstractApplication - a base class for Quarks applications providing commonly needed features.
  • TopologyProviderFactory - a configuration driven factory for a Quarks topology provider.
  • ApplicationUtilities - some general configuration driven utilities.
  • Range - a flexible range of values useful in filter predicates.
  • JsonTuples - utilities for wrapping sensor samples in a JsonObject and operating on it.
